name: Flux (itch)
description:
Flux is deceitfully simple. Fill the whole board with a single colour using as few moves as conceivable.

Relaxing soundtrack and the puzzles themselves will soothe you whilst also providing a challenge.


There are 3 difficulties - 30 levels on each difficulty.


Try to get gold in all 90 levels!

Features include:
- Relaxing soundtrack 
- Hint system
- Change board colours to your liking or if you have any form of colour blindness.

If you have any problems or requests, please email gelcubegames@gmail.com.

Hope you enjoy it!
